```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("scmap")

install.package(GRanges)
```

```{r}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
```

# Decidua reference dataset
```{r}
load(file="/icgc/dkfzlsdf/analysis/B210/Evelin/seurat_object/decidua_5000_variably_expressed_counts.RData")
decidua_meta = read.table("/icgc/dkfzlsdf/analysis/B210/Evelin/E-MTAB-6701_arrayexpress_10x_meta.txt", header = TRUE)
decidua_meta = decidua_meta[which(decidua_meta$Cell %in% colnames(decidua_counts)), ]
```

Genes in rows, cells in columns
```{r}
rowData = as.data.frame(row.names(decidua_counts))
colnames(rowData) <- c("Genes")
```

```{r}
se = SummarizedExperiment(assays = list(counts = matrix(as.numeric(unlist(decidua_counts)),nrow=nrow(decidua_counts))), rowData = rowData, colData = decidua_meta)
rm(decidua_counts)
```

Converting to SingleCellExperiment
```{r}
decidua = as(se, "SingleCellExperiment")
rm(se)
save(decidua, file = "/icgc/dkfzlsdf/analysis/B210/Evelin/seurat_object/decidua_sce.txt")
```

# Menstrual fluid dataset
```{r}
load(file = paste0("/icgc/dkfzlsdf/analysis/B210/Evelin/seurat_object/joined.RData"))
```

```{r}
rowData = as.data.frame(row.names(seu[["RNA"]]))
colnames(rowData) <- c("Genes")
```

```{r}
colData = as.data.frame(colnames(seu[["RNA"]]))
colnames(colData) = c("Barcode")
```

```{r}
se = SummarizedExperiment(assays = list(counts = as.matrix(seu[["RNA"]]@counts)), rowData = rowData, colData = colData)
rm(seu)
```

```{r}
menstrual = as(se, "SingleCellExperiment")
rm(se)
save(menstrual, file = "/icgc/dkfzlsdf/analysis/B210/Evelin/seurat_object/menstrual_sce.txt")
```
